description: frontal facing 3/4 length portrait of man seated with his right arm leaning on a table and holding a document in his right hand
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

verso, written in black marker in large lettering on Kraft paper:  [John Williams / Married Louise McGuire / Lived at Leighton Plantation / near Thibodaux, Louisiana

Daughter Cornelia, married Thomas Winder; their daughter, Lou, / married Lewis Hardy Allen in Los Angeles, 1911. They were parents of    Cornelia who married Roy A. Doty in Durham, N.C. 1937. 

Painted by William Baker (1852-1875) in 1853 / Studio at 123 Canal Street, New Orleans / until 1865; then moved to N.Y. where he taught art and painted

Restored by Leo Marzolo, Chicago, 1961]
signed: at lower left edge: [Wm. H. Baker 1853]
title: Portrait of John Williams
